statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_information WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2010
DELETE FROM vehicle_information WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2015;
DELETE FROM vehicle_information WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe' AND miles_driven >= 50000;

DELETE FROM Policies WHERE policy_id = 50 AND start_date = '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE premium_amount < 500 AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM PolicyHolder WHERE holder_id = 1001 OR name = 'John Doe';
